data.title: History of Famous Jewels and Collections: Re: Duke and Duchess Paul Friedrich of Mecklenburg

data.text:
I think we are looking at a tiara of similar shape and size worn by the lady in question, but was Princess Charlotte of Prussia present at the wedding?

The list of guests in Queen Wilhelmina's procession in the newspaper clipping does indeed include a Princess Charlotte, but I think this is Duke Wilhelm of Mecklenburg-Schwerin's and Princess Alexandrine of Prussia's daughter Princess Charlotte of Mecklenburg (18681944), who was married to Prince Heinrich (Henry) XVIII Reuss of Köstritz.

But maybe I missed that Charlotte of Prussia was also listed among the wedding guests somewhere?

I feel that the only way to identify people was, if we had a comprehensive list of wedding guests and a clue about the seating arrangements (according to rank and/or family ties?). Who for instance is the gentleman next to the mother of the groom? Prince Albert (Albrecht) of Prussia, son of Princess Marianne of the Netherlands?
